The Overlook Sponsored YOUR FUTURE (career) LOOKS GREAT FROM HERE! Current Open Positions: -FT and PT Servers, Health Center and Independent Living. -FT and PT Culinary Services Attendants (Dishwasher). -FT Cooks, Skilled Cooks, and Demi Chef. -FT Environmental Services Tech. (Housekeeping). -FT, PT, and Per Diem CNA's and Resident Care Associates. 1st/2nd/3rd shifts. $5k Sign-On Bonus! -FT Nurse Supervisors, 1st shift and 2nd shift, Health Center Skilled Nursing. Up to $7,500 Sign-on Bonus. -Hospice LPN, RN, Manager of Clinical Practice, and Director. Sign-On Bonuses of $5k-$15k. -LPN's, RN's, PT's, OT's, PTA's, Managers of Clinical Practice, Social Workers and Speech Therapists. Most come with Sign-On Bonuses of $5k-$15k. Our Perks and Benefits for FTE's (32 hours +): -VNA Team Members get Mileage Reimbursement of $.62/mile. -Tuition Reimbursement. -401k and Roth w/Company Match. -Free Daily Meals at our Charlton Campus. -Access to our Fitness Center AND Salt Water Pool. -Life/AD&D/Short Term Disability/Long Term Disability 100% employer paid. -Team Member Assistance Program if you fall on hard times. -Team Member Referral Program of $500-$1,500 for each new hire referral. -Company Events, Concerts, Red Sox Ticket Giveaways, and other great perks. *Part-Time and Per Diem Positions may be eligible for some of these offerings. View Jobs: https://theoverlookcommunityandvnahospice.applytojob.com/apply The Overlook Discover maintenance-free retirement in the heart of New England!
